div.p: We are grateful to the crew of the research vessels that collected the ichthyoplankton and oceanographic samples including, but not limited to, Noelle Bowlin, Dave Griffith, Amy Hays, Sue Manion, and Bryan Overcash. Sam McClatchie, Dave Checkley Jr., Steven Searcy, Nick Tolimieri, and an anonymous reviewer provided helpful comments to previous versions of the manuscript and Jeff Laake helped with the statistical analyses.
